body: We have some internal registrations of these kernels for DEVICE_CPU.  I'm not sure what the best way to avoid conflict is. I think we can use `PLATFORM_GOOGLE`, which should only be defined internally. @benoitsteiner / @rmlarsen? I don't see any other uses within core/kernels, so it'd be a first.
